Docs.summary: Provides a user interface for selecting bitmap files in a property browser.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The BitmapEditor class provides a simple way to select a bitmap image for a property. Starting the editor displays an **Open File** dialog box that allows directory navigation and selecting a file. The file list is initially filtered for bitmap (.bmp) files.
## Examples The following code example uses an <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute> to associate the BitmapEditor with a property.
